languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс переводит дух и кивает. В уголках его губ появляется намек на мягкую улыбку.{/n} "Сегодня у тебя был тяжелый день, {name}. Я оставлю тебя, чтобы ты могла выспаться — утром тебя будет ждать протекторат и твои подданные. Доброй ночи, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс переводит дух и кивает. В уголках его губ появляется намек на мягкую улыбку.{/n} "Сегодня у тебя был тяжелый день, {name}. Я оставлю тебя, чтобы ты могла выспаться — утром тебя будет ждать протекторат и твои подданные. Доброй ночи, {name}".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lets out a breath and nods. The rumour of a smile plays at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "You've had a difficult day today, {name}. I will leave you to sleep — your protectorate and your vassals will be waiting for you tomorrow. Good night, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс переводит дух и кивает. В уголках его губ появляется намек на мягкую улыбку.{/n} "Сегодня у тебя был тяжелый день, {name}. Я оставлю тебя, чтобы ты могла выспаться — утром тебя будет ждать протекторат и твои подданные. Доброй ночи, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a breath and nods. The rumour of a smile plays at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "You've had a difficult day today, {name}. I will leave you to sleep — your protectorate and your vassals will be waiting for your tomorrow. Good night, {name}."

{n}Heinrix lets out a breath and nods. The rumour of a smile plays at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "You've had a difficult day today, {name}. I will leave you to sleep — your protectorate and your vassals will be waiting for your tomorrow. Good night, {name}."

{n}Heinrix lets out a breath and nods. The rumour of a smile plays at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "You've had a difficult day today, {name}. I will leave you to sleep — your protectorate and your vassals will be waiting for your tomorrow. Good night, {name}."

{n}Heinrix lets out a breath and nods. The rumour of a smile plays at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "You've had a difficult day today, {name}. I will leave you to sleep — your protectorate and your vassals will be waiting for you tomorrow. Good night, {name}."

languages.text: {n}海因里希吐出一口气，点了点头。他的嘴角似乎露出了一丝隐隐的微笑。{/n}“今天真的辛苦你了，{name}。我就不打扰你休息了。到了明天，你的王朝与你的臣民们还在等着你呢。晚安，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a breath and nods. The rumour of a smile plays at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "You've had a difficult day today, {name}. I will leave you to sleep — your protectorate and your vassals will be waiting for you tomorrow. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希吐出一口气，点了点头。他的嘴角似乎露出了一丝隐隐的微笑。{/n}“今天真的辛苦你了，{name}。我就不打扰你休息了。到了明天，你的王朝与你的臣民们还在等着你呢。晚安，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix respira y asiente. Un atisbo de sonrisa aparece en sus comisuras.{/n} «Ha tenido un día difícil, {name}. Le dejaré dormir. Mañana tendrá que atender a su protectorado y sus vasallos. Buenas noches, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a breath and nods. The rumour of a smile plays at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "You've had a difficult day today, {name}. I will leave you to sleep — your protectorate and your vassals will be waiting for you tomorrow. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix respira y asiente. Un atisbo de sonrisa aparece en sus comisuras.{/n} «Ha tenido un día difícil, {name}. Le dejaré dormir. Mañana tendrá que atender a su protectorado y sus vasallos. Buenas noches, {name}».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは息を吐き出してうなずく。薄笑みの気配がその口角に浮かんでいる。{/n}「大変な日だったな、{name}。我は出て行くから休んでくれ。お前の保護領と臣下が明日もお待ちだ。お休み、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a breath and nods. The rumour of a smile plays at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "You've had a difficult day today, {name}. I will leave you to sleep — your protectorate and your vassals will be waiting for you tomorrow. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは息を吐き出してうなずく。薄笑みの気配がその口角に浮かんでいる。{/n}「大変な日だったな、{name}。我は出て行くから休んでくれ。お前の保護領と臣下が明日もお待ちだ。お休み、{name}」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix atmet aus und nickt. Der Hauch eines Lächelns umspielt seine Mundwinkel.{/n}"Ihr hattet heute einen schweren Tag, {name}. Ich lasse Euch nun schlafen – Euer Protektorat und Eure Lehnsleute werden morgen auf Euch warten. Gute Nacht, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a breath and nods. The rumour of a smile plays at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "You've had a difficult day today, {name}. I will leave you to sleep — your protectorate and your vassals will be waiting for you tomorrow. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix atmet aus und nickt. Der Hauch eines Lächelns umspielt seine Mundwinkel.{/n}"Ihr hattet heute einen schweren Tag, {name}. Ich lasse Euch nun schlafen – Euer Protektorat und Eure Lehnsleute werden morgen auf Euch warten. Gute Nacht, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix laisse échapper un soupir et hoche la tête, un semblant de sourire au coin des lèvres.{/n} « La journée a été mouvementée. Je vais vous laisser vous reposer, vous retrouverez votre protectorat et vos vassaux demain. Bonne nuit, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a breath and nods. The rumour of a smile plays at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "You've had a difficult day today, {name}. I will leave you to sleep — your protectorate and your vassals will be waiting for you tomorrow. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laisse échapper un soupir et hoche la tête, un semblant de sourire au coin des lèvres.{/n} « La journée a été mouvementée. Je vais vous laisser vous reposer, vous retrouverez votre protectorat et vos vassaux demain. Bonne nuit, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, tuttuğu nefesini verip onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor. Dudaklarının kenarında bir gülümsemenin izleri peyda oluyor.{/n} "Bugün zor bir gün oldu {name}. Daha fazla rahatsızlık vermeyeyim de biraz uyu. Protektoran ve vasalların yarın seni bekliyor olacak. İyi geceler {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a breath and nods. The rumour of a smile plays at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "You've had a difficult day today, {name}. I will leave you to sleep — your protectorate and your vassals will be waiting for you tomorrow. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tuttuğu nefesini veriyor ve onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor. Dudaklarının kenarında bir gülümsemenin izleri peyda oluyor.{/n} "Bugün zor bir gün geçirdin {name}. Daha fazla rahatsızlık vermeyeyim de biraz uyu. Protektoran ve vasalların yarın seni bekliyor olacak. İyi geceler {name}."
